price: (30) He said, "My Lord, support me against the corrupting people."
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
